Package parsing

Class UcdFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • parsing.UcdFileReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExceptionCheckProvider

    public class UcdFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExceptionCheckProvider
    The class provides different way to read, open and clean up a .ucd File.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UcdFileReader

        public UcdFileReader​(java.lang.String path)
        The constructor only needs to know te path of the file to open. Minimum operation is done on object creation. The hard work is done in the readAndCleanFile() method provided by this class.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the File to open

    • Method Detail

      • readAndCleanFile

        public java.lang.String readAndCleanFile​()
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Reads and cleans up the .ucd file. The method will modify the file in different ways. First, it removes all spaces from the beginning and end of the file. Also, it will remove all superflous duplicate splaces and replace them with a single space. Then, it removes spaces between ":". Finally, it removes all newLine token that follows a comma. This last step is executed to better analyse the different part of the file.
        Returns:
        the String that represents the content of the ucd file with modifications.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • simpleReader

        public java.lang.String simpleReader​()
        Simply returns the text as-is of a file
        Returns:
        String representation of the content of the file
